# [Interview #1181: Little City Books-AU Tour, Entry #8](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1181#8)

#### Ted Herman

Ym is confirmed to not be an Edgedancer. Does that mean that he would have become a Truthwatcher?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
